hero.subtitle: Discover a new way to experience electronic music with personalized routes, real-time recommendations, and everything you need in one place.

how_it_works.title: How FestiRoute Works
how_it_works.step1_desc: Organize your trip, accommodation, and tickets easily before the music starts.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Our AI Dazzy suggests the best schedules, routes, and places to eat based on your preferences.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Live the experience to the fullest with real-time alerts and all the information in your pocket.

features.title: Key Features
features.feature1_desc: Create and optimize your artist schedule so you don't miss your favorite DJs.
features.feature2_desc: Get suggestions for artists similar to your tastes playing at the festival.
features.feature3_desc: Notifications about schedule changes, surprise sets, and points of interest.
features.feature4_desc: Share your location and schedule with friends to meet up easily.

dazzy.subtitle: Dazzy accompanies you during your festival: helps you choose DJs, decide on outfits, and reminds you of what's important so you can just enjoy.
dazzy.example1_desc: "I'm between Anyma and Vintage Culture, which one should I go to today?"
dazzy.example2_desc: "It's going to get cold at night, should I bring a hoodie or light jacket?"
dazzy.example3_desc: "Remind me at 02:30 that I need to catch the shuttle back."
dazzy.example4_desc: "If it looks like rain tonight, let me know to bring a poncho or jacket."
dazzy.footer_text: Examples of how Dazzy can help you during your festival.

who_is_it_for.title: Who is FestiRoute for
who_is_it_for.persona1_desc: Optimize every minute of your festival. Discover hidden gems in the lineup and navigate between stages like a pro.
who_is_it_for.persona2_desc: Don't feel overwhelmed. FestiRoute is your personal guide to live an unforgettable and stress-free first experience.
who_is_it_for.persona3_desc: Keep the whole group together. Share plans, locations, and meeting points so no one gets lost.

credibility.title: Made by people who live festivals
credibility.description: FestiRoute is born from the real experience of traveling to electronic music festivals: organizing groups, managing cashless, not missing key DJs, and watching the budget.
credibility.point1_title: Thought from the crowd, not from a desk
credibility.point1_desc: FestiRoute is inspired by real trips to festivals like Tomorrowland, Ultra, and Lollapalooza, with all those details that don't appear on a flyer.
credibility.point2_desc: The app is designed as if it were for our own trips: from the checklist to how Dazzy talks to you when you have to decide quickly.
credibility.point3_desc: The product will grow by listening to those who travel, organize, and live electronic music, not just with metrics on a spreadsheet.

cta.subtitle: Join the waitlist and be the first to know when FestiRoute is available to transform your festival experience.
cta.no_spam: We won't spam you. Only important news from FestiRoute.
cta.made_by: Made by electronic music fans who also organize groups, plan trips, and don't want to miss a single drop.
